website_summaries.verdict: Pebble's newest round, thin watch takes the Pebble formula and shrinks it to a stylish design, but gives up battery life and some app support in the process.
pros: Sharp construction and a thin, comfortable design
cons: Shorter battery life than previous Pebble watches
doesn't run all Pebble apps and watch faces

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before purchase
customer_reviews.text: This watch was fantastic.... Until the watch face displayed a sad face with an error message!! I am extremely careful with this watch it has never even been splashed with water and certainly never been dropped or mistreated. When I tried to contact pebble support I was sad to find out that they have haulted all operations and are no longer a functioning company. This is a lot of money to pay for a watch that stopped functioning after such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pebble obsolete
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to activate and connect this device. As other reviews have mentioned, Pebble is no longer an active company, so it’s app is nonexistent. Fitbit and Rebble had apps that supported the device, but no longer. So.... even though the watch looks awesome, there is no app to support it, therefore I cannot connect it to my phone. I had to return because, without the required technology, it’s completely useless. Too bad. The design looked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: less than a month and battery now only lasts a few hours, so pretty useless. I immediately loved this watch, so many options and does everything I need, plus not as bulky as most smartwatches... but unfortunately after only a few weeks the battery lasts only about 7 hours, so I have to charge it several times per day which defeats the purpose of having a watch to give me notifications and track steps. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Watch face scratches very easily
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my anniversary I love the functionality of the watch ... able to keep up with my busy life text message Facebook emails Calls etc but the durability of watch glass is horrible even with screen protectors I bought the glass still has many scratches making it difficult to see the screen...I check for a replacement glass to be told pebble does not make them I would have to just buy a new watch and the original band doesn’t do well with everyday wear (order a new on line)
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Super easy smart watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this smart watch! It is not too full of programs, and it is easy to set up and use. I like the round face like a traditional watch, and you can select from a large variety of watch faces. The notification vibrations are great and you can send a voice text too. As another reviewer suggested, I charge the watch while bathing and there is plenty of charge for the day. The charger connects magnetically, so there are no tiny pins to line up or break.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a watch. Not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted it for. I get my texts. It looks more like a watch than a smart watch, which is what I wanted. I feel like it drains my phone battery but I guess that's what happens when you Bluetooth all day. I ordered a different band because I only bought red because it was the cheapest. The watch face can be changed. According to the reviews pebble was sold to fit bit and they are not supporting pebble. I bought it anyways hoping if there was a defect I could return it to amazon. So far so good. I really like it. Just needed something simple. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer able to connect...
customer_reviews.text: Pebble app has been shut down and the 3rd party apps don't connect. Waste of money. Which is too bad cuz I Loved pebble phones. Bummer :(
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: BEST. BUY. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! Received mine a few days ago and I cannot stop flaunting it. It's like 50°F out here and I'm still wearing short sleeves...I'm honestly in love with this watch. It looks cool, works great, and is pretty much the best thing I've ever bought on Amazon. It lights up when you want to see it, I play games when I'm not supposed to, there are like a gazillion different watch faces, and my friend and I have matching watches so...buy it. If you think you want it, you want it. If you want to pass this up and look at different watches, you crazy. Five billion stars for this product. Cannot praise this watch enough.
customer_reviews.author: Grabmaia

customer_reviews.title: Great simple smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: I have a really small wrist (almost child-sized) and this is probably one of the only smart watches that doesn't overwhelm my wrist. I know some people are turned off by the non-touch screen and the lack of a ton of apps, but this watch is simple and gets the job done. I was only looking for something that would give me basic notifications and allow me to check texts / ignore texts / ignore calls quickly. If you're looking for a watch where you could leave your phone far away from you and still use the watch, this isn't the watch for you - the range is only maybe 20 feet before the Bluetooth connection stops.
customer_reviews.author: Xoomer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight smartwatch ideal for women who don't want a chunky block on their wrist
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It takes a short time to set up but once you get the hang of it, it is awesome. The included leather band is lovely, if a bit warm during the summer. After a few weeks of wear it is getting a nice burnished look. I'll end up getting another band as well (the mesh woven type). Love that it syncs right up to my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: LeyaRuth

customer_reviews.title: one of the rare non-ugly smart watches
customer_reviews.text: Very cute (when you replace the band), but it definitely feels dated. I would love this with some more modern features. Also, the backlight is very dim, so expect to have to tilt the watch to catch the sunlight outside.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Switching from Android to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I love that I receive my messages on my Pebble, my issue is that I cannot reply to messages now that I have gone from Android to iPhone. Now I can see if message is important then reply from iPhone. I am still happy with Pebble.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pebble Round Review
customer_reviews.text: Good smart watch for women. Keeps you up to date with notifications and texts while looking like a regular watch. The speech to text is on point too. I have the 14mm band model.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love pebble
customer_reviews.text: I wish pebble still existed. I love this watch. It is my second and unfortunately my last.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this watch. I have a fit bit and a Samsung but this is my favorite by far! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Foiles

customer_reviews.title: not recommend
customer_reviews.text: watch panel is pretty, but the red band looks cheap. Compare to fitbit function, the app is terrible, the sleeping data are messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Unsupportable
customer_reviews.text: This product is unsupportable. Once charged the device directs buyer to download Pebble App. This app site states Pebble iS no longer in business and directs buyer to Fitbit app. Fitbit site does not currently support. $85.00 is a steep price for a bracelet
customer_reviews.author: walkingngrace1

customer_reviews.title: Love my pebble
customer_reviews.text: Love my pebble! Small, light weight. Keeps good track of steps (me and my boyfriend compare out steps, he has a garmon Vivofit, and they are always similar after a long walk)
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch. Does everything I want it to do and doesn't do the stuff I don't need from a smartwatch anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Rita B.

customer_reviews.title: They're old, even new
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first pebble, when the battery quit holding a charge, I bought this one. Right out of the box the battery barely lasts 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Pebble Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I've found this little device extremely useful. Best of all, it doesn't drain my phone the way some other brands have.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Out of date
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, all the apps are obsolete so it couldn't serve the purpose of a smart watch.
customer_reviews.author: Crs kidd

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunally no quality for this good looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: The pebble time round silver has a great design. Looks like a normal watch. Unfortunally its durabillaty is bad. My first watch worked fine for a year after which the glass came of and the batterylife was short. I ordered a new one and the glass came off after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-klant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love pebbles, and I'm sad to see them go :(
customer_reviews.author: luvkisses

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: Item got really hot when charger was plugged in and it never worked. it's been close to a year and never got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: The plastic watch face fell off less than 1 year old. Pebble is no longer- so I can't get repair/replacement.... :(
customer_reviews.text: The plastic watch face fell off less than 1 year old. Pebble is no longer- so I can't get repair/replacement.... :(
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pebble, I do wish it had a stopwatch/ timer though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smartwatch for women
customer_reviews.text: My second Pebble round, haven't found anyone as thin and neat. Too bad they dont make it anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY pebble doesn't exist anymore
customer_reviews.text: i liked this watch,simple to use, easy to charge and thin and small enough to not look too bulky on my petite size wrists. sadly had to return after learning that the company who created this watches was bought by fitbit and they were not interesting in adding the pebble watches to their products which means that in the moment the watch breaks of software starts working bad then you are left with a useless product. i didn't like that in the product description this was not mentioned at all, i learned about it thanks to an amazon reviewer and then confirming it on my own looking in internet.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great at tracking my steps and I love all the different watch faces I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, terrible battery.
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't even last a day. Disabled 90% of apps and watch still dies by bedtime. If Pebble were still in business I'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Watch stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had my watch 4months today and it has stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My front screen just popped off. Didn't drop it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Martina I. de la Cruz

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: update 12/28/2016 - when Ios updated to 10 my original pebble steel quit working, now there is no support since pebble is out of business, Unfortunately I purchased this one before they announced they were going out, I am experiencing multiple connection issues with the new watch and cannot rely on it. It is ashamed since the watch provided just what I wanted in a smart watch. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap! Very easy to place on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: JA Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She loves it! Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pebble!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my Pebble Round Watch. I will probably never wear another watch again!
customer_reviews.author: LaideeJ

customer_reviews.title: Yes,that's why I hate  it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pebble time round on January 9, 2017 .Just several days later,It's decrease 10$. Yes,that's why I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: step counts and have awatch face without a second hand
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts less than a day although I use it only for calendar notifications (which don't always seem to work), step counts and have a watch face without a second hand, do not get weather or anything else. Additionally, it seems like I have to reboot or reconnect to my phone pretty regularly. On the plus side, it doesn't look like a smart watch. Update: The charge now lasts less than an 8 hour work day, at which point it no longer even works as a watch. I would not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: lisainmaryland

customer_reviews.title: Still amazing after all these years
customer_reviews.text: Love my Pebble Time Round. Works awesome with the new Rebble services, and has lots of great apps and watch faces still. I use it daily, and need to charge it about every 2 days. This is my first Pebble ever, and it still works great in 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery
customer_reviews.text: This boasts up to a 2 day battery life. I get 1 day. Its slim, light, and passes as a watch. The battery life is poor. Its supposed to get up to 2 days. I get 1 day with minimum to moderate use. The build is basic. Not a luxury watch here. Also, if you're not a tech person, don't try this because there's some extra work involved with setting up your phone and watch now that Fitbit bought em out.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: After searching and being constantly disappointed by numerous other fitness trackers, this one serves all my needs. The clock face stays on and displays seconds, something other fitness trackers don't do. It's also very stylish and light. I am particularly enjoying the gallon challenge that encourages one to drink more water. I've had the device for three days and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lanier Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Expanding battery
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Pebble round, BUT. This is the second one I've had die on me due to an expanded battery. The battery on both watches expanded and pushed the case apart about 7 months after I purchased them. It's disappointing, since this is exactly the form factor and function I'd want in a smart watch, but I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: a good smart watch
customer_reviews.text: i like the watch itself but the band broke quickly from swapping leather to silicone for workouts. i like that it shows my texts, counts my steps, encourages activity and i can change the backgrounds. my only complaint is the battery doesn't last that long, usually a day to a day and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy Smartwatch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she really loved it. You need to upgrade the firmware. Just keep trying and it will succeed eventually. Don't let the warning message hold you back, you will see this message "The unit is in factory mode and need to update firmware" just keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amsal Polla

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a much for personalization options, never gotten it wet other than hand washing and some how the screen fogs up every now and then as if there's water inside. Update the screen fell off and got lost not broken or anything it just fell off. The glue undid itself and fell off. :(
customer_reviews.author: klupe29

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I returned it very dissatisfied. Not a smart watch or even a hybrid
customer_reviews.author: Ken p

customer_reviews.title: I returned this pretty quickly when I was disappointed by the large bezel
customer_reviews.text: I returned this pretty quickly when I was disappointed by the large bezel, small screen, and very small strap size that was difficult to find replacements for. Also, at the time of purchase, it was announced that Pebble was bought by another company, so future software updates and apps may not be supported. Other than that, it seemed like a nice watch, just not the one for me
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Good watch with up to 7 day battery life. The Rebble app is very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Terrible battery life. Pebble is out of business. There is no option to have it serviced.
customer_reviews.author: RMG

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair to Motorola android
customer_reviews.text: I have an Android phone and cannot get it to pair to the phone, thus unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for anniversary.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife and she loves it. Very sleek design and the same amazing Pebble quality and software interface. I bought this model since it was less expensive than the other White face Pebble Time Round models with the only differences being the watch band color. I also purchased a few other bands that range in price from $10-20.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great smart watch!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheaper alternative to the Iwatch this is a nice product. I use it to see notifications, count steps and of course the time. Easy to setup and pair. There are plenty of fun watch faces to choose from
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months after purchase, my watch is no longer functional and I can't seem to get any help from pebble support. Not pleased considering that I can't return it at this point
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and super functional.
customer_reviews.text: I swapped the band for a turquoise colored one. I love the way this looks. I missed texts and calls frequently before, but this watch alerts me. There are plenty of watch faces to download and some great apps.
customer_reviews.author: Stevadoor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pebble time round watch. Love them because it doesn't look like a bulky smart watch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a day early. Absolutely gorgeous and easy to use. I am a women with a very small wrist and this watch isn't too big. Does everything I wanted a smart watch for. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S.Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this! She loves being able to see the messages without pulling out her phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not sync with Samsung S6 so had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not sync with Samsung S6 so had to return it. Tried to do research but to no avail. Also, no Pebble support as they were bought out by FitBit.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac N Austin

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. I had this
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I had this watch for less than 6 months and it is completely unusable. The top glass/plastic cover is coming off and I can't read the display anymore. It looks washed out and nothing I do will fix it. Now since pebble is out of business I can't get any of my money back. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Rex S.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. The battery life is short though
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. The battery life is short though. Have to charge it daily although it fully charges in 20 min. Pebble seems to have gone out of business too so the watch will become obsolete at some point. Hopefully not too soon.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 1st month satisfied. But
customer_reviews.text: 1st month satisfied. But, Between watch gets wider. Don’t A/S ᅮᅮ I'm going to put it on a strong bond
customer_reviews.author: basspark

product_meta.title: Pebble Technology Corp Smartwatch for iPhone/Android Smartphone - Silver/red
product_meta.description: This is a smartwatch? All the easy-to-use, time-saving features that Pebble pioneered to define the smartwatch category, now available in a design that’s lighter and thinner than any other smartwatch. Includes Pebble Health, a built-in activity and sleep tracker with daily reports and weekly insights. Its battery lasts for days - not hours - and its bright e-paper display is always on. Check notifications, incoming calls, texts, and your calendar, all at a glance. Behind all those smarts, it’s still a great watch. It just also happens to look like one.
feature_bullets: The world’s lightest and thinnest smartwatch. Probably the most comfortable too.
Includes Pebble Health, a built-in activity and sleep tracker with daily reports and weekly insights
Full suite of Pebble features, including timeline calendar alerts, notifications, and silent alarms
Splash resistant so you can live your life like normal
Battery provides power for up to 2 days, and recharges fast: add a day of power in just 15 minutes; Quick-change bands and downloadable watch faces and apps for easy personalization

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars215 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Watch, Charging Cable, Quick Start Guide
